mapper.select: select u.user_type as user_type , u.name as name , u.loginID as loginID , u.user_email as user_email , u.password as password , u.user_tel1 as user_tel1 , u.user_tel2 as user_tel2 , u.user_tel3 as user_tel3 , u.div_cd as div_cd , d.detail_name as divCD_name , d2.detail_name as chaCD_name , u.user_zipcode as user_zipcode , u.user_address as user_address , u.user_dt_address as user_dt_address , u.user_company as user_company , u.del_cd as del_cd FROM (select * FROM tb_detail_code d where d.group_code = 'divCD') d JOIN tb_userinfo u ON u.div_cd = d.detail_code JOIN (select * FROM tb_detail_code d where d.group_code = 'chaCD') d2 ON u.user_type = d2.detail_code where loginID = #{loginID};
